Datos.Consulta: select A.id as id,E.id as idEl, U.id as idUb,U.Descripcion as ubicacion,E.numserie as numserie, E.fechaCompra as fechaCompra,E.Cantidad as cantidad, E.Cantidad as cantReal, 'N' as Baja from Elementos E, Articulos A, Ubicaciones U where A.id=E.id_Articulo and U.id=E.id_Ubicacion and A.id='{id}' order by U.Descripcion,numserie;
